title-group.article-title: Negotiating Value/Valuing Negotiation: A Joint Case Study for Business and Law Students

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1996 Journal of Financial Education, Jean L. Heck

abstract.p: How can finance professors close the gap between theoretical abstraction and real-world application? One technique advocated by the authors is negotiation skills training. This article describes a negotiation module that introduces business students to the techniques managers commonly use to negotiate agreements. The module culminates in a joint exercise that brings finance students and law students together in a realistic negotiation.
